articles.title: COVID-19: Recent study recommends comprehensive research on African traditional medicine - Tribune Online
articles.description: A recent study carried out by three university lecturers in Nigeria and the United States of America (USA) has called for comprehensive research on traditional medicine in African countries to prevent future COVID-19 pandemic in the continent.The stu
